statements: SELECT test_id, test_name, test_group, test_variation, test_result FROM sales_funnel_ab_test_results;
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_element, test_group FROM sales_funnel_ab_test_results ORDER BY test_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_funnel_ab_test_results WHERE test_group='Control';
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM sales_funnel_ab_test_results WHERE test_result > 1000;
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_variation FROM sales_funnel_ab_test_results ORDER BY test_name ASC, test_variation DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_funnel_ab_test_results WHERE test_group='Control' AND test_result > 0.5 ORDER BY test_result DESC
SELECT test_name, test_element, test_group, test_variation FROM sales_funnel_ab_test_results WHERE test_variation='A' AND test_result BETWEEN 0.25 AND 0.75
SELECT test_id, test_group, test_result FROM sales_funnel_ab_test_results WHERE test_name LIKE '%Homepage%' ORDER BY test_id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT test_name, test_group FROM sales_funnel_ab_test_results WHERE test_result < 0.4
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_group, test_variation FROM sales_funnel_ab_test_results WHERE test_element='Button' ORDER BY test_group, test_id DESC
SELECT * FROM ab_tests;
SELECT test_name, test_description FROM ab_tests;
SELECT test_name, test_description, test_start_date FROM ab_tests WHERE test_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, variation_name, conversion_status FROM test_results WHERE conversion_status = true;
SELECT user_id, conversion_value, timestamp FROM test_results ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ab_tests;
SELECT test_name, test_description FROM ab_tests ORDER BY test_start_date DESC;
SELECT test_id, count(*) as num_results FROM test_results GROUP BY test_id ORDER BY num_results DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(conversion_value) as total_conversion FROM test_results WHERE conversion_status = true GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_conversion DESC;
SELECT test_name, variation_name, conversion_status, timestamp FROM ab_tests JOIN test_results ON ab_tests.test_id = test_results.test_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT test_id, test_name FROM ab_tests;
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_data WHERE name = 'John Smith';
SELECT test_name, test_start_date, test_end_date FROM ab_tests WHERE test_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT result_id, user_id, conversion FROM test_results ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ab_tests;
SELECT test_name, test_start_date, test_end_date FROM ab_tests ORDER BY test_start_date DESC;
SELECT test_name, COUNT(*) as total_tests FROM ab_tests GROUP BY test_name;
SELECT t.test_id, tr.result_id, u.name FROM ab_tests t JOIN test_results tr ON t.test_id = tr.test_id JOIN user_data u ON tr.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_conversions FROM test_results WHERE conversion = true;
SELECT * FROM SalesFunnelTests;
SELECT test_name, test_start_date, test_status FROM SalesFunnelTests;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM TestParticipants;
SELECT * FROM TestResults WHERE result_metric_value > 50;
SELECT test_name, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM SalesFunnelTests JOIN TestAnalysis ON SalesFunnelTests.test_id = TestAnalysis.test_id;
SELECT * FROM SalesFunnelTests;
SELECT test_name, test_status FROM SalesFunnelTests WHERE test_status = true;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, participant_group FROM TestParticipants WHERE participant_group = 'A';
SELECT test_id, result_metric_name, result_metric_value FROM TestResults WHERE result_metric_name LIKE '%conversion%';
SELECT * FROM TestParticipants JOIN SalesFunnelTests ON TestParticipants.test_id = SalesFunnelTests.test_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE signup_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM groups ORDER BY group_id DESC;
SELECT element_name, element_type FROM sales_funnel_elements WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT test_name, start_date, end_date FROM tests WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_funnel_elements WHERE id = 1;
SELECT test_id, user_id, conversion_status FROM test_results WHERE test_group = 1 ORDER BY conversion_status DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE signup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT test_name, start_date, end_date FROM tests WHERE start_date < '2022-05-01' AND end_date > '2022-04-01';
SELECT element_name, element_type, test_group FROM sales_funnel_elements WHERE element_type LIKE '%email%' AND test_group IN (1, 2);
